thread.title: NYC teen scientist wins $250k for his math model on potato late blight

title: NYC teen scientist wins $250k for his math model on potato late blight
text:
NYC teen scientist wins $250k for his math model on potato late blight 2:54pm EDT - 02:08 
New York student Benjy Firester wins 1st place for his model on the spread of late blight - the plant pathogen that sparked the Irish potato famine of the 1840s and 1850s. His model could be used to prevent crop damage in the future. Roselle Chen reports.
